                :                                               :                
                |                                               |                
        .-------+                                              -+-------.        
        |       |                                               |       |        
        |       | taken from http://www.bachelorsofscience.com  |       |        
        |       |                                               |       |        
        |       | The Bachelors Of Science are Phil &#039;Rene&#039;      |       |        
        |       | Collis and Chris Doe. Hailing from San        |       |        
        |       | Francisco, California, Relative newcomers,    |       |        
        |       | the Bachelors of Science have already become  |       |        
        |       | firm fixtures in the global dnb scene with    |       |        
        |       | their unique sound ranging from liquid        |       |        
        |       | flavors to dancefloor beats, with tracks      |       |        
        |       | smashing into top record boxes with the likes |       |        
        |       | of Brian Gee, Bailey, LTJ Bukem, Grooverider, |       |        
        |       | High Contrast, Doc Scott, Flight, Alix Perez, |       |        
        |       | Redeyes, State Of Mind, JuJu, DJ Lee, BigBud  |       |        
        |       | and L Double to name but a few.               |       |        
        |       |                                               |       |        
        |       | After several very successful releases in     |       |        
        |       | 2006 including "Jah No Dead" and "Wicked      |       |        
        |       | Ways", the Bachelors have been working hard   |       |        
        |       | behind the scenes and are pleased to announce |       |        
        |       | their debut LP "Science Fiction" forthcoming  |       |        
        |       | on Horizons Music on January 28, 2008. Months |       |        
        |       | in the making, this album has already been    |       |        
        |       | tipped as one of THE albums of 2008. Out on 3 |       |        
        |       | piece vinyl, digital download and 12 track    |       |        
        |       | CD, mastered by none other than LEMON D of    |       |        
        |       | Valve Recordings, and featuring special       |       |        
        |       | guests Alaska (aka Paradox), Saburuko,        |       |        
        |       | Brooklyn, Redeyes and more!!                  |       |        
        |       |                                               |       |        
        |       | ---                                           |       |        
        |       |                                               |       |        
        |       | some nice tracks on this lp, &#039;the ice dance&#039;, |       |        
        |       | &#039;strings track&#039; and &#039;sugar&#039; being             |       |        
        |       | my faves. unfortuneatly they wasted a         |       |        
        |       | perfectly good side of vinyl with &#039;sweat&#039;,    |       |        
        |       | which is nothing short of cringeworthy        |       |        
        |       | really. hearing a man attempting to sing sexy |       |        
        |       | lyrics and making &#039;uh&#039; noises over a static   |       |        
        |       | drum track with no bassline to speak of is    |       |        
        |       | not my idea of good music, but each to their  |       |        
        |       | own eh?                                       |       |        
        |       |                                               |       |        
        |       | id also like to note that the pressing of     |       |        
        |       | this lp is far from great. aside from         |       |        
        |       | being a cheesy hospital-esque track with no   |       |        
        |       | real substance, track 1 is just outright      |       |        
        |       | distorted and sounds crap. the rest of the lp |       |        
        |       | isnt as bad, but there are numerous parts     |       |        
        |       | with odd &#039;sizzling&#039; artefacts and general     |       |        
        |       | clicks, pops and crackles which you wouldnt   |       |        
        |       | really expect from brand new vinyl. ive done  |       |        
        |       | my best to clean up what i can but ill        |       |        
        |       | certainly be replacing this with the cd / web |       |        
        |       | release when it surfaces.                     |       |        
        |       |                                               |       |        
        |       |                                               |       |        
        |       | enough rambling, enjoy.                       |       |        
        |       |                                               |       |        
        |       |                                               |       |        
        `-------+-                                              +-------`

|                                                                             |  
|   This release may contain copyrighted material, however SOUR guarantees    |  
|   that this material was at least available to one person "on the street"   |  
|     and that the possession of this material is in no way privileged.       |  
|                                                                             |  
| SOUR has been releasing good quality drum&#039;n&#039;bass, jungle & oldskool rips to |  
|    the internet drum&#039;n&#039;bass public since summer 1999. Originally a small    |  
|       operation, we have now reached levels of international acclaim.       |  
|                                                                             |  
|  SOUR is dedicated to both the availability and promotion of music to the   |  
|  public, and our rips are intended to reflect these ideals. Specifically:   |  
|                                                                             |  
| . SOUR is dedicated to the promotion of new music that is currently         |  
|   available to buy. If you like something you hear, you are obliged to      |  
|   attempt to purchase an original copy.                                     |  
|                                                                             |  
| . SOUR is dedicated to the promotion of old music that may no longer be     |  
|   available to buy.                                                         |  
|                                                                             |  
| . SOUR is dedicated to the expansion and infiltration of drum&#039;n&#039;bass        |  
|   worldwide! We provide a service where none is available, specifically in  |  
|   many remote countries where traditional distributors can not afford to    |  
|   target. Also, the availability of drum&#039;n&#039;bass in an easily accessible     |  
|   form expands the potential for real world sales to people who may not     |  
|   otherwise have considered buying drum&#039;n&#039;bass.                             |  
|                                                                             |  
| . SOUR is dedicated to the expansion of the online and offline real world   |  
|   scenes. With more listeners enjoying what they hear, clubs and venues can |  
|   only expect MORE people to attend events; DJ&#039;s can only expect MORE       |  
|   people to pay to see THEM.                                                |  
|                                                                             |  
| By accident of today&#039;s current real world distribution arrangements, many   |  
|   artists will find that SOUR releases IMPROVE their real world sales;      |  
|  especially for items only on vinyl. This is the basis upon which SOUR      |  
|                                 operates.                                   |  
|                                                                             |
